title: Botanical Bloom Midi Dress
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a midi-length dress with a soft A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, and a gentle scoop neckline, featuring an all-over botanical floral print in pastel tones, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, on a plain white background.
prints_patterns: botanical floral print with scattered blossoms and foliage
techpack: A-line midi dress with short flutter sleeves, scoop neckline, botanical floral print on cotton voile, cotton lining, invisible side zipper closure, self-fabric waist tie, topstitched neckline and hem. Print repeat: 30cm x 30cm, colors matched to provided palette.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary floral print trends from South Asian designer collections, adapted for commercial ready-to-wear.
design_text:
Botanical Bloom Midi Dress (FLR001)
Colors: pastel pink, sage green, buttercream, soft lavender, warm beige
Fabrics: lightweight cotton voile, cotton lining
Prints/Patterns: botanical floral print with scattered blossoms and foliage
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: scoop neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: invisible side zipper, narrow self-fabric waist tie, topstitching along neckline and hem
Techpack: available
